home.coverText:
Welcome to the
future of no nonsense
transactions!

parallax.first: Myriad is an open source, truly decentralized, digital currency that can be sent peer-to-peer over the internet.
parallax.second: There are no intermediaries, no chargebacks and most importantly you control your money.

nonsense.title: In today’s world, there are a lot of coins and a lot of claims. It can be hard to spot what’s real and what’s nonsense.
nonsense.caption: Here are some things to look out for:

pre_mining.title: Pre-mining
pre_mining.body: <0>Premining is the mining or creation of a number of cryptocurrency coins before the cryptocurrency is launched to the public.</0><0>During the ICO bubble from 2017 to 2018, premining was often a red flag that an ICO was being launched to fleece investors rather than</0>

myriadIs.title: But Myriad on the other hand is:

trusted.title:
Trusted, secure and
up-do-date
trusted.body: Myriadcoins unique multi-algorithm approach means that it has extra resistance to 51% attacks.

community.title:
Community-driven with
democratic decision making
community.body: No one and everyone controls Myriad. It’s a community driven project full of volunteers.

fair.title: Fair distribution and mining
fair.body: Myriadcoin has no pre-mine or IPO and was fairly launched. Myriadcoin uses a long mining period, which prevents a large portion of the coins to be consolidated in the hands of very few.

attacks.title: 51% Attack Resistance
attacks.body: Thanks to our multi algorithm approach.

multi-algo.title: Multi-algorithm
multi-algo.body: SHA256d, Scrypt, Myr-Groestl, Argon2d and Yescrypt.

longblocks.title: Longblocks
longblocks.body: Increased security, less orphans, higher difficulty.

esperanto.title: Saluton!
esperanto.body: Myriad is used to support content creators in the Esperanto community

telegram.title: Got any questions or just wanna chat?

top.title: Trusted, secure and up-do-date
top.body: <0>Myriad addresses the issues with ASIC specialization and centralization, 51% attacks, unfair distribution and slow transactions by an innovative approach with a multi-algorithm blockchain.</0><0>It is the first multi-algorithm coin and its innovation has influenced many coins to come. Myriad has a proven track record and has since its release in 2014 stood the test of time and have adapted when needed.</0><0>All development can be followed and discussed at ???.</0>

items.text: Myriad was launched by 8bitcoder, forked from Zetacoin. It was the first cryptocurrency to use five proof-of-work algorithms in an effort to increase security as well as broaden the base of people who could mine it - SHA256d and Scrypt for ASIC miners, Skein and Myr-Groestl for GPU miners, and Qubit for GPU and CPU miners.
Myriad hard-forked to allow merge-mining on its SHA256d and Scrypt algorithms in an effort to improve security and achieve a more stable hashrate on those two algorithms.

Myriad used mining consensus to replace the Qubit algorithm with the Yescrypt algorithm to preserve mining decentralization. Myriad became the first cryptocurrency to use mining consensus to change a mining algorithm.

items.title: Fair
items.value: Myriad is fairly distributed. No Premine and No ICO.

items.title: Multi-Algo
items.value: Scrypt, SHA256D, Yescrypt, Skein and Myriad-Groestl

community.title: Community-driven with democratic decision making
community.body: <0>No one and everyone controls Myriad. It’s a community driven project full of volunteers. For large changes in Core mining consensus is used. This principle works because of Myriads decentralized mining.</0><0>Myriad strives to be a coin for everyone, not a elite/selected few. Myriad is for the people it can help most. With a truly secure and decentralized coin, we pour our focus and effort into real use cases to help the people with the greatest need.</0><0>For large changes in Core mining consensus is used. The latest mining consensus were 2016 with Yescrypt and 2019 with Argon2D.</0>

mine.title: How to Mine Myriad

wallet.title: 2. Choose a wallet
wallet.body: Do not store your cryptocurrency on an exchange. You should have awallet ready and setup to store your coins. These wallets support Myriad...

pool.title: 3. Join a mining pool
pool.body: A mining pool is the pooling of resources by miners, who share their processing power over a network.

mine.ready: Now you’re ready to start mining!

need.title: Is there a need for cryptocurrencies?

buy.title: Buy Myriad
buy.body: To get your hands on your first Myriad you need to use an exchange. You can buy Myriad with fiat money or exchange another cryptocurrency for Myriad.
